title: Trump Issued Subpoena by Jan. 6 Panel, Setting Up Legal Battle
description: While the former president has suggested he might testify live before the committee, it was far more likely that the demand would lead to a legal fight.
dc:creator: Luke Broadwater and Michael S. Schmidt
category: House Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack
media:credit: Rebecca Noble for The New York Times
media:description: Former President Donald J. Trump in Mesa, Ariz., last week. He released a lengthy, rambling letter that attacked the Jan. 6 committeeâ€™s work and reiterated false claims of widespread voting fraud but did not address whether he would comply with a subpoena.
